description:
The AVAL Science Foundation has been attempting to cause a Second Great Collapse by installing artificial keystones throughout the city! At this rate, everyone in Tokyo will be transformed into monsters, and the city will become a hellscape!
In order to stop their plot, Chihiro and his friends head to the Infinity Theater where Kark Kaburagi is performing a concert. As the reaper`s deadly melody rings throughout the theater, total war breaks out between Chihiro`s friends and the AVAL Science Foundation.
Will they be able to stop the Second Great Collapse?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Cet appel provient de mon âme
Waga Na o Yobu no wa, Waga Tamashii
我が名を呼ぶのは, 我が魂
